title: Make Streaming Expressions Java 7 Compatible
description: SOLR-7377 added Streaming Expressions to trunk. It uses, by choice and not necessity, some features of Java 8. This patch is to make minor changes to three files to make Streaming Expressions compatible with Java 7 and therefor able to be included in version 5.2.
